person.persName: Saville D. Hardin (Harrison/ Pendleton County, Farmer, laborer and wagoner in the 6th Ky Cav USA)

body.p: Pendleton County and Harrison County, Kentucky, day laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Leigh Earles Hardin in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on October 24, 1842. Father of Harvey Hardin, John Hardin, and Zerilda Hardin. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Day laborer in Pendleton County in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a wagoner from December 23, 1861, to January 6, 1863.
